MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH45 postcode area of Eddleston. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:28pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the work required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:24pm on Saturday 20th February 2021.
